heading1: Engaged and activated diverse immigrant communities
body1: C&C partnered with the New Americans Campaign on a nationwide effort to connect with Legal Permanent Residents and guide qualified LPRs through the process of applying for U.S. citizenship. Effectively engaging these diverse communities required cultural sensitivity around tone, imagery, and language, which C&C achieved through rigorous ad testing and learning.
headline: Engaged and activated diverse immigrant communities
campaignDescription: C&C partnered with the New Americans Campaign on a nationwide effort to connect with Legal Permanent Residents and guide qualified LPRs through the process of applying for U.S. citizenship. Effectively engaging these diverse communities required cultural sensitivity around tone, imagery, and language, which C&C achieved through rigorous ad testing and learning.
supportiveText: Developed a repeatable, scalable model for partner collaboration and long-term impact
